longBusinessSummary: Mountain Pacific Bancorp, Inc. operates as the bank holding for Mountain Pacific Bank that engages in the provision of various banking products and services to individual and corporate customers in Snohomish, Skagit, and King Counties. The company offers a range of deposits, including demand, checking, savings, money market, and individual retirement accounts, as well as certificates of deposit; and loans, such as home loans, mortgage loans, owner-occupied real estate loans, investment real estate loans, construction loans, business loans, small business administration loans, and maritime lending, as well as debit and credit cards. The company also provides mobile branch services, merchant services, remote deposit capture, wire transfers, e-statements, online cash management, letter of credit, ATM, and online and mobile banking services. It has branches in Everett, Lynnwood, Ballard, Burlington, and Bellingham. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Everett, Washington.
